ENGINEERINGPROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Diligent contract and project operations manager bringing 8
years of experience in oil and gas, operations, contract
management, tendering/bid management, engineering
support, project engineer, organizational development and
team building within diverse industries. Proficient in planning,
coordinating and executing successful production strategies,
projects and contracts. Adept at improving operational
stability, efficiency and profitability. Team-minded individual
works well with senior stakeholders and effectively prioritize
tasks.
